name: Leather armor
description: Standard light armor provided as starting equipment for Warlocks.

name: Sickle
description: A simple weapon provided as starting equipment for Warlocks.

name: Dagger
description: A simple weapon provided as starting equipment for Warlocks.

name: Orb
description: An arcane focus used for casting spells.

name: Book (Occult Lore)
description: A book containing occult lore, provided as starting equipment for Warlocks.

name: Scholar's Pack
description: A standard adventurer's pack containing a backpack, a book of lore, an ink bottle, an ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, a little bag of sand, and a small knife.

name: Book of Shadows
description: A book conjured by a Warlock who chose the Pact of the Tome. It contains eldritch magic that only the Warlock can access. If the book is lost, the Warlock can conjure a new one during a Short or Long Rest.

properties.effect: Allows the Warlock to learn two cantrips from any class's spell list. These cantrips count as Warlock spells for you.
properties.replacement: Can be conjured again at the end of a Short or Long Rest if lost.

name: Dagger
description: A small, easily concealed blade.

name: Quarterstaff
description: A sturdy wooden staff, often used as an arcane focus.

name: Robes
description: Standard clothing worn by a Wizard.

name: Spellbook
description: A book containing the spells a wizard knows, essential for preparing and casting spells.

name: Scholar's Pack
description: A standard adventuring pack suitable for a scholar, containing various useful supplies.

name: Spellbook
description: A unique repository for a wizard's spells. It is a Tiny object that weighs 3 pounds, contains 100 pages, and can be read only by the wizard or someone they identify. Used for preparing and copying spells.

name: Dagger
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Criminal background (2 included).

name: Spear
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Soldier background.

name: Shortbow
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Soldier background.

name: Staff
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Sage background. Typically functions as a Quarterstaff.

name: Arrows
description: A bundle of arrows provided with the Shortbow for the Soldier background.

name: Calligrapher's Supplies
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Acolyte and Sage backgrounds.

name: Holy Symbol
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Acolyte background.

name: Parchment
description: Sheets of writing material. Acolyte receives 10 sheets, Sage receives 8 sheets.

name: Book
description: A generic book. Acolyte receives a book of prayers; Sage receives a book concerning history.

name: Dark Common Clothes
description: A set of dark common clothes provided as starting equipment for the Criminal background.

name: Pouch
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Criminal background.

name: Traveler's Clothes
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Criminal and Soldier backgrounds.

name: Crowbar
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Criminal background.

name: Thieves' Tools
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Criminal background.

name: Robe
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Sage background.

name: Rapper's Supplies
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Sage background.

name: Gaming Set
description: An unspecified type of gaming set provided as starting equipment for the Soldier background.

name: Healer's Kit
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Soldier background.

name: Quiver
description: Provided as starting equipment for the Soldier background.
